confPresentationDescription: Diapers and Wipes crafted with premium cotton, plant-based and other thoughtfully selected materials. All with the dryness & protection you trust from Pampers.
confVideoSectionDescription: As a scientist at Pampers, creating the best diapers was always a passion. But that passion became personal when Sara became a mom to preemie twins. That experience drove her to help create a collection that combines Pampers' trusted protection with thoughtfully selected materials and zero fragrance. And hey, some cute designs wouldn’t hurt!
confVideoSectionFooterText: “I spent my days creating and testing new diapers. Then, I became a mom… to preemie twins.”
